name: streamproxy
description: Stream Proxy - A proxy for your streams

scripts.compile-win: pkg -t  node14-win src/main.js -o bin/win-x64/streamproxy.exe && cp bin/win-x64/streamproxy.exe bin/win-x64/instalations_preset/install_with_streamlink_included/streamproxy.exe
scripts.compile-all: npm run compile-win && npm run compile-linux && npm run compile-NAS

author: Alexander Sabino <asabino2@gmail.com>
